title: OPPOâ€™s first Android tablet offers a 120Hz display, Snapdragon 870, and stylus support
content:
After Xiaomi and Realme, OPPO has become the latest Android OEM to join the tablet league. Alongside the new Find X5 flagship lineup, the Chinese OEM has unveiled its first Android tablet called OPPO Pad. It’s a premium tablet featuring an 11-inch high refresh rate display with stylus support, flagship Snapdragon chipset, powerful speakers, and

The post OPPO’s first Android tablet offers a 120Hz display, Snapdragon 870, and stylus support appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The OPPO Pad is OPPO' first Android tablet, featuring an 11-inch 120Hz display, Snapdragon 870 chipset, quad speakers and more.
